thread.title: Celtic announce the signing of Carlton Cole
thread.title_full: Celtic announce the signing of Carlton Cole

title: Celtic announce the signing of Carlton Cole
text:
Celtic announce the signing of Carlton Cole 22 Oct 2015 11:16:58 
Former Chelsea and West Ham striker Carlton Cole has signed for Celtic. 
The 32-year-old has signed a contract until the end of next season following a trial spell. 
Cole was released by the Hammers in the summer after netting three goals in 26 appearances last season.
